pharmaceuticalProducts.name: Amprenavir
pharmaceuticalProducts.description: Amprenavir is available in tablet form and contains 500mg of the active ingredient. It is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV infection.

pharmaceuticalProducts.name: Ibuprofen
pharmaceuticalProducts.description: Ibuprofen is available in capsule form and contains 250mg of the active ingredient. It is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) commonly used for pain relief and reducing inflammation.

pharmaceuticalProducts.name: Fenofibrate
pharmaceuticalProducts.description: Fenofibrate is available in tablet form and contains 160mg of the active ingredient. It is used to lower cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood.

pharmaceuticalProducts.name: Cyclosporine
pharmaceuticalProducts.description: Cyclosporine is available in oral capsule form and contains 100mg of the active ingredient. It is an immunosuppressive drug used to prevent organ rejection after transplantation.

pharmaceuticalProducts.name: Ritonavir
pharmaceuticalProducts.description: Ritonavir is available in tablet form and contains 100mg of the active ingredient. It is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV infection.

pharmaceuticalProducts.name: Saquinavir
pharmaceuticalProducts.description: Saquinavir is available in capsule form and contains 500mg of the active ingredient. It is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV infection.
